lyrics:
94 contributorscount on me lyricsintro
ohohoh

verse 1
if you ever find yourself stuck in the middle of the sea
ill sail the world to find you
if you ever find yourself lost in the dark and you cant see
ill be the light to guide you

we find out what were made of
when we are called to help our friends in need

ill be there
and i know when i need it

and youll be there
cause thats what friends are sposed to do oh yeah
